cells.name: # Series

queries.query: SELECT last("numSeries") AS "mean_numSeries" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_database" WHERE host = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT last("numSeries") AS "mean_numSeries" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_database" WHERE host = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `influxdb` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf InfluxDB plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/influxdb).

cells.name: # Measurements

queries.query: SELECT last("numMeasurements") AS "mean_numMeasurements" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_database" WHERE host=:host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT last("numMeasurements") AS "mean_numMeasurements" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_database" WHERE host=:host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `influxdb` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf InfluxDB plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/influxdb).

This dashboard gives you an overview of your InfluxDB instance and includes metrics from the `influxdb_*` measurements populated by the [Telegraf InfluxDB Input Plugin](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/influxdb).

cells.name: Filesystems usage

queries.query: SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "used" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."disk" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "path" FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "used" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."disk" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "path" FILL(null)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `disk` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf Disk plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/disk).

cells.name: Memory usage

queries.query: SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "last_used_percent" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."mem" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "last_used_percent" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."mem" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

colors.name: Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?
Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?
Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `mem` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf Mem plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/mem).

cells.name: System Uptime

queries.query: SELECT last("uptime")/86400 AS "mean_uptime" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."system" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host:  FILL(previous)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT last("uptime")/86400 AS "mean_uptime" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."system" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host:  FILL(previous)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `system` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf System plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/system).

cells.name: Network

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("bytes_recv"), 1s) AS "received", non_negative_derivative(max("bytes_sent"), 1s) AS "sent" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."net" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("bytes_recv"), 1s) AS "received", non_negative_derivative(max("bytes_sent"), 1s) AS "sent" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."net" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `net` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf Net plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/net).

cells.name: CPU Utilization %

queries.query: SELECT mean("usage_system") AS "system", mean("usage_user") as "user", mean("usage_iowait") as "iowait", mean("usage_idle") as "idle"  FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."cpu" WHERE host = :host: and time > :dashboardTime: AND "cpu"='cpu-total' GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT mean("usage_system") AS "system", mean("usage_user") as "user", mean("usage_iowait") as "iowait", mean("usage_idle") as "idle"  FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."cpu" WHERE host = :host: and time > :dashboardTime: AND "cpu"='cpu-total' GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `cpu` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf CPU plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/cpu).

cells.name: System Load

queries.query: SELECT mean("load1") AS "load1", mean("load5") AS "load5", mean("load15") AS "load15" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."system" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT mean("load1") AS "load1", mean("load5") AS "load5", mean("load15") AS "load15" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."system" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `system` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf System plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/system).

cells.name: nCPU

queries.query: SELECT last("n_cpus") AS "mean_n_cpus" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."system" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: fill(previous)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT last("n_cpus") AS "mean_n_cpus" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."system" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: fill(previous)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `system` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf System plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/system).

cells.name: # Measurements Per DB

queries.query: SELECT last("numMeasurements") AS "mean_numMeasurements" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_database" WHERE host=:host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "database" FILL(previous)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT last("numMeasurements") AS "mean_numMeasurements" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_database" WHERE host=:host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "database" FILL(previous)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `influxdb` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf InfluxDB plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/influxdb).

cells.name: # Series Per DB

queries.query: SELECT last("numSeries") AS "mean_numSeries" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_database" WHERE host = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "database" FILL(previous)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT last("numSeries") AS "mean_numSeries" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_database" WHERE host = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "database" FILL(previous)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `influxdb` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf InfluxDB plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/influxdb).

cells.name: InfluxDB GC activity

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("PauseTotalNs"),1s)/1000000 AS "mean_PauseTotalNs" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_runtime" WHERE host = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("PauseTotalNs"),1s)/1000000 AS "mean_PauseTotalNs" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_runtime" WHERE host = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `influxdb` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf InfluxDB plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/influxdb).

cells.name: InfluxDB active requests

queries.query: SELECT mean("reqActive") AS "mean_reqActive" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_httpd" WHERE host = :host: and time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT mean("reqActive") AS "mean_reqActive" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_httpd" WHERE host = :host: and time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `influxdb` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf InfluxDB plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/influxdb).

cells.name: InfluxDB - HTTP Requests / Min

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("queryReq"),1m) AS "reads" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_httpd" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
queries.label: count/s

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("queryReq"),1m) AS "reads" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_httpd" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("writeReq"),1m) AS "writes" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_httpd" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("writeReq"),1m) AS "writes" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_httpd" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `influxdb` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf InfluxDB plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/influxdb).

cells.name: InfluxDB - Client errors

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("clientError")) AS "client_errors" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_httpd" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
queries.label: count/s

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("clientError")) AS "client_errors" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_httpd" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("authFail"), 1s) AS "auth_fail" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_httpd" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("authFail"), 1s) AS "auth_fail" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_httpd" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `influxdb` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf InfluxDB plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/influxdb).

cells.name: InfluxDB - query executor duration

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("queryDurationNs"), 1s) / 1000000 AS "duration_ms" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_queryExecutor" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(1m)
queries.label: ms

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("queryDurationNs"), 1s) / 1000000 AS "duration_ms" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_queryExecutor" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(1m)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `influxdb` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf InfluxDB plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/influxdb).

cells.name: InfluxDB - written points / min

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("pointReq"),1m) AS "points_written" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_write" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
queries.label: points/s

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("pointReq"),1m) AS "points_written" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_write" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `influxdb` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf InfluxDB plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/influxdb).

cells.name: InfluxDB - Write Errors

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("writeError")) AS "shard_write_error" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_write" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
queries.label: errors/s

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("writeError")) AS "shard_write_error" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_write" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("serveError")) AS "http_error" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_httpd" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("serveError")) AS "http_error" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_httpd" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `influxdb` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf InfluxDB plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/influxdb).

cells.name: InfluxDB Memory Heap

queries.query: SELECT mean("HeapAlloc") AS "mean_HeapAlloc", mean("HeapInUse") AS "mean_HeapInUse", mean("HeapSys") AS "mean_HeapSys" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_runtime" WHERE host=:host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT mean("HeapAlloc") AS "mean_HeapAlloc", mean("HeapInUse") AS "mean_HeapInUse", mean("HeapSys") AS "mean_HeapSys" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_runtime" WHERE host=:host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `influxdb` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf InfluxDB plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/influxdb).

cells.name: # CQ / Minute

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(/.*/),60s) FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_cq" WHERE "host" = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY host, time(:interval:) fill(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(/.*/),60s) FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."influxdb_cq" WHERE "host" = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY host, time(:interval:) fill(null)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `influxdb` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf InfluxDB plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/influxdb).

query.influxql: SHOW TAG VALUES ON :database: FROM :measurement: WITH KEY=:tagKey:
